PhonyInfoChart.item00: All the following values are temporary as of 2017/Jan/08 02:15. Though they are temporary, it is important to note that a lot of the strings here will remain or at least inspire the future greatness they will achieve.

NameOfItem.item16: Sigil Ring of a King's Knight

DescriptionOfItem.item01: This is an Ax, it is a very useful tool in many situations.
DescriptionOfItem.item02: Rope is a tool that will probably be used in caves.
DescriptionOfItem.item03: Matchbooks are tools that contain matches, a good quick way to make a flame.
DescriptionOfItem.item04: Waterskins are a handy tool for keeping the party hydrated.
DescriptionOfItem.item05: An old gun, one where it looks like something has rotted away most of the metal.
DescriptionOfItem.item06: A piece of a piece of armour. This item is probably drugs.
DescriptionOfItem.item08: Today's guns don't use bullets like this, they're mostly just balls of metal. This is different but seems to match those of the rotted and rusted firearms we've found before.
DescriptionOfItem.item09: This would probably be better used as clothing than whatever it is now.
DescriptionOfItem.item10: These are usually found with other larger pieces of metal that have been rotted away.
DescriptionOfItem.item11: Bet this is a turtle engraved on the ruby. There's no ruby? Oh. What is this?
DescriptionOfItem.item12: This gun looks older than the ones that have been rotted, but it's rusted instead.
DescriptionOfItem.item13: No, this is a turtle. Right here in the corner by the frame.
DescriptionOfItem.item14: How about this one, Gold or Turtle? Silver? But it's all black.
DescriptionOfItem.item15: If we don't give this to the king he might exile us.
DescriptionOfItem.item16: This ring was worn by some kind of noble, one of great importance to someone else.
